pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Huo4 bi4 Ji1 jin1
Guo2 ji4 Huo4 bi4 Ji1 jin1 Zu3 zhi1

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. to 本幣|本币

sentences.english: Commodity money takes the form of a commodity with intrinsic value.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣本身即具備某種固有財貨的價值。

sentences.english: What are the currency pairs and time frames that BURU trades on?
sentences.chinese: BURU交易時間圖表以及貨幣對是什麼？

sentences.english: It took some time to develop a central money-marking business.
sentences.chinese: 這使得建立和發展中央貨幣制造業頗費了一些時間。

sentences.english: Romania and Hungary are operating under I.M.F.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞和匈牙利正在接受國際貨幣基金組織的救助。

sentences.english: Print monetary and nonmonetary determinations (407 and 410).
sentences.chinese: 打印貨幣或非貨幣決定。

sentences.english: Print monetary and nonmonetary determinations (407 and 410).
sentences.chinese: 打印貨幣或非貨幣決定。

sentences.english: However, monetary stimulus is not an open-ended, continuous course of action, says Cavey .
sentences.chinese: 但卡維認爲，貨幣激勵措施不會無休止的持續下去。

sentences.english: Hong Kong has three Banks issue currency, spend attention see denominations.
sentences.chinese: 香港有三家銀行發行貨幣，花錢注意看清面額。

sentences.english: Traditional schoolbook says inflation will cause devaluation.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的教科書說通貨膨脹將導致貨幣貶值。

sentences.english: Upward revaluation of currency is sometimes disbenefit to our company.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣升值有時候對我們的公司沒有好處。

sentences.english: Emoney is no longer just a matter of geeks playing games.
sentences.chinese: 電子貨幣不再只是幾個電腦狂人玩遊戲了。

sentences.english: Their franc is the most expensive currency on our list.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它們的瑞士法郎是我們列表中最貴的貨幣。

sentences.english: The value of money lessens during inflation.
sentences.chinese: 通貨膨漲期間貨幣貶值。

sentences.english: It has simply lost its physical body, gone virtual.
sentences.chinese: 它僅僅只是失去了紙幣的皮囊，變成虛擬貨幣而已。

sentences.english: A monetary rule is a requisite for restoring the Fed’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣規則是重建美聯儲獨立性的不二法門。

sentences.english: Payment and pricing can be in IDR or USD or RMB and others currencies.
sentences.chinese: 付款和定價可以是印尼盾或美元或人民幣及其他貨幣。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
